title: Nuclear Weapons Free World - Peace on the Earth
description: Protecting the earth and preserving the human race is not only the United Nations' responsibility; it is the responsibility of every rational human being. The purpose of humanity on this planet is to grow and spread love, peace, and harmony in all directions. Humanity's greatest advancements have always begun with a small number of people. This book is intended to arouse the consciousness of a select few individuals. Diversities and distinctions are humanity's strengths, not its weaknesses. Nuclear weapons cannot be used to resolve any issue. Humanity requires numerous reforms and innovations to enhance its safety, security, and dignity. This book talks about the changes and the new things that can happen as a result of those reforms and innovations.This book is dedicated to creating a more secure and better world. It is an eminently readable and erudite introduction to contemporary international peace, nonviolence, and conflict resolution. The article discusses techniques for enhancing the strength and reliability of international peace. The book is comprised of nine major sections:Understanding the transforming process of humanity Transforming process of countriesThe dangers of nuclear weaponsLimitations of United NationsPower and Role of Individual Leaders Creating global peaceSupporting global peaceReforms and innovationsHumanity beyond nuclear weapons.
author: Amit Ray
